mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: "Public Showcase", "The Computer Calls", "'Red' Warrick", "A History of Square Dancing", "All Season Dancers of Belgium", "Take A Good Look: Who's on First?", "Lead Step", "The 1986 National Convention", "The Land of Sevillana", "On the Record", "Current Releases", and "Square Dance Date Book." This edition also includes the regular features entitled "From the Floor" (Letters to the Editor), "As I See It", "The Changing Scene", "Ladies On The Square", "Advanced Dancing", "Mostly Modular", "The Dancers Walkthru", "Traditional Treasury", "Roundancer Module", "Paging the Round Dancers", "The Callers Notebook", "StyleLab", "Round the World of Square Dancing", "Workshop", "Caller of the Month" and "On the Record."
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
